review: Love this! I can stream anything to my big TV and it works great! I bought this versus the fire stick because reviewers said it worked better. I just set it on top of my DVD player, as it's only about 6" square. Speaker seems to work well, but I don't use it too much. I started out with a trial version of prime and have Netflix streaming. A lot of the prime tv/movies options said "unavailable" when I tried to play, so I cancelled that at the end of my trial and just have Netflix now. Tons of movies and tv shows to watch. I'm thinking of cancelling my cable tv as I hardly ever watch it anymore now that I have the fire tv. Would definitely buy again (BTW, I'm 63 and a little techy but not much, and had no trouble getting this going).
